title: Strengthening Language Learning Competencies Through Self-Regulated Learning Strategy Training

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational language proficiency and experience in online learning
context.additional_context: Emphasis on long-term learning sustainability and self-directedness considering practical application

learning_goals: Learners can apply self-regulated learning strategies (self-assessment, goal setting, time management) to language learning contexts with over 90% accuracy.
Learners can demonstrate a 40% or higher increase in the frequency of using self-regulated learning strategies after 8 weeks through a portfolio.
Learners can achieve a 15% or higher improvement in learning efficiency based on strategy utilization during long-term assignments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
